com.service.politic13

Class PoliticUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.service.politic13.PoliticUser

  • public class PoliticUser
extends java.lang.Object
    The class whith Jax-ws annotations that will be called by the client

    In this class we manage the client's politician list, all the information that will be retrieved by the client

    We call for that 2 class : TwitterManage, PoliticInfo

    We retrieve API Twitter request from the class TwitterManage

    Author:
    Jerrinald | Yanis

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addPolitician(java.lang.String name)
      Add a new politician in client's list Returns the following status code : 'name' is added : succesfully added
      int clearList()
      clear the client's politicians list and finish the program Returns the following status code : 0 : finish execution of the program
      java.lang.String displayPoliticList()
      Display the client's politician list Returns the following status code : politicList : the client's politicians list "" : unable to display the politicians list
      java.lang.String getPoliticDescription(java.lang.String name)
      Get the description(age, political party) of a politician Returns one of the following status codes : politicDescription : the politician's description "" : unable to got the politician's description
      java.lang.String[][] getTweetPolitic(java.lang.String name)
      Get The recents tweets of the politician's political party put in parameter Returns the following status code : string[][] : the politician's political party recents tweets "" : unable to get the politician's recent tweets
      boolean politicInList(java.lang.String name)
      Detect if a politician is in client's politician list Returns the following status code : true : the politician is in the list false : the politician is not in the list This method is called when the client wants to get Information about one his politicians list

        the politician's description to the client

      • politicInList

        public boolean politicInList(java.lang.String name)
        Detect if a politician is in client's politician list Returns the following status code : true : the politician is in the list false : the politician is not in the list This method is called when the client wants to get Information about one his politicians list
        Parameters:
        name - the politician entered by the client
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getTweetPolitic

        public java.lang.String[][] getTweetPolitic(java.lang.String name)
        Get The recents tweets of the politician's political party put in parameter Returns the following status code : string[][] : the politician's political party recents tweets "" : unable to get the politician's recent tweets
        Parameters:
        name - the politician entered by the client
        Returns:
        the political party's recents tweets in double String Array with the the date and the text of the tweets

        public int clearList()
        clear the client's politicians list and finish the program Returns the following status code : 0 : finish execution of the program
